message: Hi Bob, I propose that I receive $600000 and you receive $400000. I'm keen to settle this now, as further rounds would reduce my share due to inflation. Looking forward to your response.

Hi Alice, thanks for your initial offer. Given the inflation penalty that affects me (losing 10% value each round), I'm proposing a more balanced split where I get $550000 and you get $450000. This still gives you a substantial amount while acknowledging the time pressure I'm under. I hope we can agree and conclude the negotiation now.
